post.body: Just don't bite the rich white hand that feeds ya! If I'd have followed Mr. Drummond, I'd be a millionaire by now.
@johnw37 Thanks! Gary needs to check out BradManTV live soon! I'll try and scope it as soon as I can reach the keyboard :)
Gary doesn't mean to correct God or anything, but Shavar played 'Dudley.'
Oh, Gary's got skill. Gary uses skills he's learned from watching Jason Statham movies to get the best deal.
Gary is following BradmanTV now! It IS the most amazing web show I've never heard of!
I must confess my sins and say I've not spoken to Shavar Ross since his 'Cousin Oliver' antics got us canceled. Sucka owes me $12.
I could throw out a 'holla' or a shout out every now and again. Fo sho and F***, F***, F*** Nah, I'm good as is. Thanks!
Remember when every celebrity could get their own cartoon? Man, thems were good times.
I'm a worthwhile celebrity. I'm a worthwhile celebrity. http://www.abelkeogh.com/blog/?p=581 I'm a worthwhile celebrity.
Want to make a gingerbread house, but my ginger wife thinks its edible racism. http://tinyurl.com/6rfojd Hey kettle, you're afro-american.
Good kitty. You get a Cheet-O. http://tinyurl.com/6lpt42
Let me get this straight.. the girl from 'Twilight' is a pothead, but if she's not, then I'm not black? Huh. http://www.2snaps.tv/9817238
Now that Fishburne is on CSI, if they make a Matrix 4 then Gary's ready!! http://tinyurl.com/5luwn8
So many people have asked 'Gary, why would you wear such a thing to court?' Honestly, I thought the redneck I hit would be drunk and naked.
Someone's mistaken me for Tupac again. I'm not dead! http://tinyurl.com/5zgchj
Aw yeah! They're playing my song! This is my clubbin' face! http://tinyurl.com/6hlsd2
If you hit a redneck with your truck, it's only a $100 fine. I should do this more often!! http://tinyurl.com/5r3fh4
If my bedtime wasn't at 7 o'clock, I'd watch @bradmantv !!!
Overalls + Cowboy hat + sexxay = Gary Coleman Bada**! http://tinyurl.com/6hu5b2
Despite rumor, I have never spent the night with Michael Jackson in the 80's. It was 1997, and I was homeless.
Gary looks a little different these days. http://tinyurl.com/6hmlgl
Child star Candace Cameron lost 22 pounds. Easy to do when you haven't had a job in 13 years. I'm crazy buff. My baby abs are lethal weapons
And THIS is why Shannon and I haven't consummated our love. http://tinyurl.com/5t8hgc Thanks Lonely Island!
Some kids just came up to get me inside a Poke' ball. Well, I'm not busy. I'm going to go battle a Squirtle, whatever that is.
To all my fans - Gary's going to judge a celebrity impersonation convention for a week. Santa knows where my tiny stockings will be!
I'm trying to get the wife to dress up as an Arby's girl for my birthday, but she says she doesn't wear her uniform on her day off.
People often ask me how I feel about 'Avenue Q.' Well, the last time I was near a puppet, Dudley asked where the bad man touched me.
